rounds.response:
I see that my previous offers were rejected, so I'll try adjusting my proposal to make it more appealing while still aiming to increase my overall resource value. I'm offering 6 Wheat, which has a total value of 36, in exchange for 1 Ore, valued at 37. This is a slight trade-off for me, but it could help build toward a better portfolio.

[Offer: 6 Wheat -> 1 Ore]
